ISSUE.TITLE: getting a "deploy failed" error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### repro steps: 1. go to https://nodered-ldzodlpekq.now.sh 2. go to the web tab 3. from the nodes listed in the left pane, under "output", drag a "debug" node onto the main work area 4. drag a 2nd "debug" node onto the canvas 5. click the red "deploy" button in the top right. 6. Notice you get the error below:

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Bump `ncc` to v0.5.3 (#128) * Bump `ncc` to v0.5.3 * Also bump `ncc` to v0.5.3 in now-node
